notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction in the the western Sundar Bazar area of Nepal. Located roughly 29 to 33 kilometers west of the 25 April 2015 earthquake epicenter, the western Sundar Bazar area was impacted by this event. Using satellite imagery acquired 29 April 2015 UNITAR / UNOSAT identified a total of 121 affected structures. Approximately 26 of these were destroyed, 77 severely damaged, and 18 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
